data.actual_result: The default icon is bigger than other server icons.
data.expected_result: The default icon is of the same size as other icons.
data.short_description: In the mutual friends tab in a profile, the icon of a server having the default icon is larger compared to other icons.
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a person who has a mutual friend with whom you share at least one server with the default icon. - Open their profile. - Click on mutual friends. - Observe the mutual friend.
